overview: Lesbian X is proud to present the second installment of Lesbian Lessons, a celebration of beautiful women with relentless lesbian passion. Including lessons with intense, foreplay, and explosive orgasms, this is unscripted lesbian sex at its finest. Do not miss this release.
title: Lesbian Lessons 2
